author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: Brilliant brick built bird (BBBB)
review:
Opening;

The Lego flamingo from 2013 is a very nice build with great interesting pieces in pink .

The build-

Starting at the head using the snot technique for the whole build is really interesting the black small claw makes for a great beak and the 1×1 pink snot bricks make the eyes . The neck just had some sloping detail to get the windy shape , the wings are a very nice part useage and the legs are affective in design .

In conclusion-

I have a lot of nostalgia for this set and still like to get the occasional monthly mini model build would definitely recommend this set for fans of brick built animals.
